remarks: A disjoint union of open intervals is measurable.  (This proof does not use countable choice, unlike ~ iunmbl .)  Lemma 565Ca of [Fremlin5] p. 214.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)
statement:
uniioombl.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> ( <_ i^i ( RR X. RR ) ) ) $.
uniioombl.2 $e |- ( ph -> Disj_ x e. NN ( (,) ` ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
uniioombl.3 $e |- S = seq 1 ( + , ( ( abs o. - ) o. F ) ) $.
uniioombl $p |- ( ph -> U. ran ( (,) o. F ) e. dom vol ) $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
